hadiths.text: This tradition has also been narrated through a different chain of the authority of Mu’adhah al-‘Adawiyyah from ‘A’ishah. This version adds; we were commanded to complete the (abandoned) fast, but were commanded to complete the (abandoned) prayer

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْحَائِضِ لاَ تَقْضِي الصَّلاَةَ
chapter.eng-name: The Menstruating Woman Does Not Make Up The (Missed) Prayers
